title: 2024 Nobel Prize In Medicine Goes To US Scientists For microRNA Discovery
content: Scientists Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for the discovery of microRNA and its role in gene regulation, the award-giving body said on Monday.
summary: Scientists Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for the discovery of microRNA and its role in gene regulation, the award-giving body said on Monday.

title: Japan Admits Doctoring Cabinet Photo To Make Ministers Look Less Unkempt
content: Japan's government admitted Monday manipulating an official photo of the new cabinet to make its members look less unkempt, after online mockery of their sagging trousers.
summary: Japan's government admitted Monday manipulating an official photo of the new cabinet to make its members look less unkempt, after online mockery of their sagging trousers.

title: "India Has Always Been First Responder": PM Modi Meets Maldives President Muizzu
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday underlined New Delhi's position as a "close friend" of the Maldives and emphasised his government's readiness to respond to medical and economic emergencies as part of its 'neighbourhood first' foreign policy.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday underlined New Delhi's position as a "close friend" of the Maldives and emphasised his government's readiness to respond to medical and economic emergencies as part of its 'neighbourhood first' foreign policy.

title: Kamala Harris Is Unfazed By Any Surprises, Predicts US Poll "Nostradamus"
content: Despite his unwavering forecast for Kamala Harris, Dr Allan Lichtman emphasised the importance of voter participation. "The outcome is up to you, so get out and vote," he urged.
summary: Despite his unwavering forecast for Kamala Harris, Dr Allan Lichtman emphasised the importance of voter participation. "The outcome is up to you, so get out and vote," he urged.

title: "October 7 - The Day We Failed": Israel's Army Chief On War Anniversary
content: Israel is fighting a "long war", the country's military chief told its soldiers and commanders a day ahead of the first anniversary of the 2023 Hamas attack, vowing to wipe out its "enemies" who seek to destroy Israel.
summary: Israel is fighting a "long war", the country's military chief told its soldiers and commanders a day ahead of the first anniversary of the 2023 Hamas attack, vowing to wipe out its "enemies" who seek to destroy Israel.

title: Man Sets His Arm On Fire In US To Protest Against Israel-Hamas War
content: Thousands marched in US cities from Washington to Los Angeles on Saturday, demanding an immediate ceasefire as the war in Gaza nears the one-year mark, with a man attempting to self-immolate in protest.
summary: Thousands marched in US cities from Washington to Los Angeles on Saturday, demanding an immediate ceasefire as the war in Gaza nears the one-year mark, with a man attempting to self-immolate in protest.

title: "So Much Death": Gaza Journalist Explains Mental Toll Of Covering War
content: On the morning of October 7, 2023, Ismail Abu Hatab, a photojournalist, woke up to the deafening roar of rockets being fired from Gaza towards Israel.
summary: On the morning of October 7, 2023, Ismail Abu Hatab, a photojournalist, woke up to the deafening roar of rockets being fired from Gaza towards Israel.

title: Use Of Sarco 'Suicide' Pod Suspended Amid Swiss Criminal Investigation
content: Advocacy groups behind the controversial Sarco' suicide pod have suspended applications for its use, pending a criminal investigation into its first deployment in Switzerland.
summary: Advocacy groups behind the controversial Sarco' suicide pod have suspended applications for its use, pending a criminal investigation into its first deployment in Switzerland.

title: Haunting Image From Gaza Went Viral As Israel Responded To October 7 Attack
content: The photograph of Inas Abu Maamar, face buried in the shrouded body of her dead five-year-old niece Saly, was taken days after Israel began its military offensive on Gaza.
summary: The photograph of Inas Abu Maamar, face buried in the shrouded body of her dead five-year-old niece Saly, was taken days after Israel began its military offensive on Gaza.

title: A Year Later: Hamas Attack Anniversary Overshadowed By Renewed Conflict
content: With candles, prayers and music, commemorations for the October 7 attack began in Israel's Tel Aviv on Sunday at a ceremony to mark the first anniversary of the Hamas onslaught at the Nova music festival.
summary: With candles, prayers and music, commemorations for the October 7 attack began in Israel's Tel Aviv on Sunday at a ceremony to mark the first anniversary of the Hamas onslaught at the Nova music festival.

title: A Doctor Visited His Gaza Hometown A Week Before October 7. He Never Left
content: It has been a year since the war between Israel and Hamas erupted, a conflict that has brought unspeakable devastation to the Gaza Strip. The days since October 7 have stretched into months of relentless bombings, displacement, and desperation.
summary: It has been a year since the war between Israel and Hamas erupted, a conflict that has brought unspeakable devastation to the Gaza Strip. The days since October 7 have stretched into months of relentless bombings, displacement, and desperation.

title: Japan-Bound Flight Played R-Rated Movie For All With No Option To Switch
content: The incident occurred on flight QF59, causing discomfort among travellers, particularly families with children.
summary: The incident occurred on flight QF59, causing discomfort among travellers, particularly families with children.

title: Esmail Qaani: The Iran Quds Chief, Missing Since Israeli Strike On Beirut
content: Iran's Quds Force commander Esmail Qaani has not been heard from since Israeli strikes on Beirut late last week, two senior Iranian security officials told Reuters.
summary: Iran's Quds Force commander Esmail Qaani has not been heard from since Israeli strikes on Beirut late last week, two senior Iranian security officials told Reuters.

title: 2 Chinese Nationals Killed In A Blast In Pakistan's Karachi
content: A massive blast on a road near the airport of Pakistan's largest city killed two Chinese nationals, Beijing's embassy said Monday, after a separatist militant group claimed an attack in the area.
summary: A massive blast on a road near the airport of Pakistan's largest city killed two Chinese nationals, Beijing's embassy said Monday, after a separatist militant group claimed an attack in the area.

title: Off-duty Cop Killed While Breaking Into Neighbour's House In US
content: Recently, the officer was assigned to the Fugitive Unit of the Atlanta Police Department (APD). He joined the department in November 2015.
summary: Recently, the officer was assigned to the Fugitive Unit of the Atlanta Police Department (APD). He joined the department in November 2015.

title: Live Updates: Air Raid Sirens In Israel After Rockets Fired From Gaza
content: Today marks a year after the Palestinian militant group Hamas attacked Israel, triggering the year-long Israeli onslaught on the Gaza Strip. After nearly 1,200 people were killed during the October 7 attacks, Israel vowed to destroy Hamas.
summary: Today marks a year after the Palestinian militant group Hamas attacked Israel, triggering the year-long Israeli onslaught on the Gaza Strip. After nearly 1,200 people were killed during the October 7 attacks, Israel vowed to destroy Hamas.

title: Trump Rallies At Failed Assassination Site A Month Before US Polls
content: Donald Trump's much-hyped return to Butler, Pennsylvania, came exactly one month before the November 5 presidential election, the outcome of which President Joe Biden suggested on Friday might not be peaceful.
summary: Donald Trump's much-hyped return to Butler, Pennsylvania, came exactly one month before the November 5 presidential election, the outcome of which President Joe Biden suggested on Friday might not be peaceful.

title: Maldives President's Diplomatic U-turn, Special Appeal For Indian Tourists
content: The Maldives will not act to undermine India's security and views Delhi as a "valued partner and friend", and cooperation in several fields will "always be a priority", President Mohamed Muizzu said Sunday as he arrived in the national capital.
summary: The Maldives will not act to undermine India's security and views Delhi as a "valued partner and friend", and cooperation in several fields will "always be a priority", President Mohamed Muizzu said Sunday as he arrived in the national capital.

title: Airstrikes In Beirut, Missiles Hit Israel City As Gaza War Completes A Year
content: Israel and Hezbollah exchanged more fire ahead of the first anniversary of the Hamas attack, which triggered a war in Gaza and further escalated tensions in the Middle East.
summary: Israel and Hezbollah exchanged more fire ahead of the first anniversary of the Hamas attack, which triggered a war in Gaza and further escalated tensions in the Middle East.

title: "Completely Transformed Reality": Netanyahu Ahead Of Gaza War Anniversary
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday vowed to achieve victory and said his country's military "completely transformed reality" in the year since Hamas's October 7 attack, which has left the country fighting two wars.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday vowed to achieve victory and said his country's military "completely transformed reality" in the year since Hamas's October 7 attack, which has left the country fighting two wars.
